key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity impacting net interest margins and profitability
Intense competition from larger national banks, credit unions, and fintech companies
Regulatory compliance challenges in cybersecurity, anti-money laundering, and consumer protection
Economic uncertainty in primary markets affecting loan performance and deposit growth
Cybersecurity risks including potential data breaches and cyberattacks
controversies: Pending merger with Atlantic Union Bankshares creating potential integration risks
Decline in interest income due to lower market interest rates
social_issues: Commitment to data privacy and security for customer information
governance_issues: Leadership changes aimed at driving growth and innovation
